answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.Your symptoms could be due to neuropathy. It is a disorder of the nerves which causes numbness, tingling, unusual sensations and sometimes pain. Diabetes Mellitus can cause neuropathy. It could be side effect of your medications. Other causes like vitamin deficiencies and alcohol consumption can cause neuropathy. You may need to consult your primary care physician to detect the cause.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: I have a warm feeling in my left leg, the warm feeling has been off and on all day.  I am currenting taking medication for my cholesterol.
title: women's health
